report.title: List of taxon meanings present in a country
report.description: A list of distinct taxon meanings present in a country, identified by the country attribute ID.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM taxa_taxon_lists ttl JOIN taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values v ON v.taxa_taxon_list_id = ttl.id AND v.deleted=false -- Exclude exctinct/absent. AND v.int_value IN (16407, 16408, 16409, 16410) WHERE v.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id = #taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id#

param.name: taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id
param.description: The ID of the taxa taxon list attribute associated with the country code.
